plot: Two friends buried time capsules as kids. 14 years later, it's time to dig them up. However, delight turns to a fight for their lives once they both discover buried items that the the other friend didn't know about.
title: Time Capsules
plot_es: Two friends buried time capsules as kids. 14 years later, it's time to dig them up. However, delight turns to a fight for their lives once they both discover buried items that the the other friend didn't know about.
plot_en: Two friends buried time capsules as kids. 14 years later, it's time to dig them up. However, delight turns to a fight for their lives once they both discover buried items that the the other friend didn't know about.
